item.title: CVE-2024-23523|2024-03-16T04:26:07.549Z -- Elementor -- Elementor Pro
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Elementor Pro.This issue affects Elementor Pro: from n/a through 3.19.2.
